plot outline: Santhosh (chronic stress due to his ex-girlfriend's marriage) reprisal with Vasanth (who is getting married in couple of days) and pushed Saranya (escort) into a distinctly intentional lock inside his new build Manhattan, which is under legal issues in an inhabited high-rise, and finds hard to survive without communication to anyone and specially being with unknown.
title: Roommate
plot: When Santhosh learns that his ex-girlfriend is getting married, he decides to get a reprisal by pushing an escort Saranya into a locked newly built space called Manhattan. Will she survive without water, food and electricity?

Santhosh (chronic stress due to his ex-girlfriend's marriage) reprisal with Vasanth (who is getting married in couple of days) and pushed Saranya (escort) into a distinctly intentional lock inside his new build Manhattan, which is under legal issues in an inhabited high-rise, and finds hard to survive without communication to anyone and specially being with unknown.::Vasanth Nagarajan
